example.name: contactform
example.synopsis: Example for creating a contact form
example.description:
Here we use the email function of WSForm to send an email to the admin and show a success message to the user.

We also create a page in the wiki with this information.

The form

See : Example

The template (Title: Mail body for contact form)

%ws_to=admin@example.com%
%ws_from=webmaster@example.com%
%ws_subject=Contact form submitted%

Dear admin,


$name has send you a message using the contact form on our Wiki.

Details:

Name : $name

Email : $email

Message : $content

Best regards,

WSform contact form


Page that will be created (Title Contact-form:random number)

{{contact form:
|name=Filled in by the user through the form
|email=Filled in by the user through the form
|content=Filled in by the user through the form}}
example.example:
Your name

Your email address

Your message
